content: includes instructions to crochet a beautiful granny style sunflower handbag a fun crochet purse pattern ***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www crochet365knittoo com the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern *** materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook size g - tapestry needle for weaving in ends the purse is 11 inches wide by 19 inches tall including handles pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner copyright ©2019 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase
